Animal Name: European Lynx 
Scientific Name: Lynx lynx 
IUCN Conservation Status: Least Concern 
Habitats: Forest
Continents: Europe, Asia
Countries: Switzerland, France, Italy, Czech Republic 
Summary: The European Lynx is a unique wildcat that inhabits Switzerland, France, Italy, and the Czech Republic. It has a short tail and brown fur with spots. You will find this wild cat a fascinating breed of a domestic cat
